comments.body: I think the misspelling is actually intentional, so that it fails :) But perhaps a comment to that effect both for this test and the one above could be helpful :)

> I think the misspelling is actually intentional, so that it fails :) But perhaps a comment to that effect both for this test and the one above could be helpful :)

yeah, it's  intentional, I will add useful comment for it. ðŸ˜€

see: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/0a7050f531f8fa4de19e8aa4feb274aee4d8340c/pkg/kubelet/util/util_unix.go#L83

This testing  needn't  use  fallback protocol,  because the GetAddressAndDialer func doesn't return protocol  ðŸ˜ƒ

could you add a test case for a valid but non-unix domain address so we exercise that error case?
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/kubelet/util/util_unix.go#L87-L89
